admissions.introduction: Thank you for expressing an interest in CBIT. Investing in quality education is essential, and CBIT offers career-defining programs that shape a bright future. These years are crucial for building relationships with fellow students and teachers, laying the foundation for success.
admissions.why_cbit: A course at CBIT can change the course of your life. Our top-of-the-line Engineering and Management Sciences courses ensure a promising tomorrow through innovative, industry-based teaching methodologies. We focus on practical knowledge and real-world exposure to better equip students for their dream careers.

admission_procedure.general: All the admissions are based on merit.

criteria: 15% for candidates throughout India without reservations through IIT JEE Mains Ranks / TSEAMCET Ranks / Qualifying Exam Marks
15% for NRI / NRI sponsored candidates through Qualifying Exam Marks

b_category.criteria: Through GATE / TSPGECET / Qualifying Exam Marks

notes: Reservations are followed as per State Government Norms in all the A-Category Admissions.
All the A-Category seats are filled by the respective Convenors of TSEAMCET, TSPGECET, TSICET.
All the B-Category seats are filled by the Institute Management as per the guidelines issued by TSCHE, Telangana State.

contact: Admissions will be made as per the guidelines issued by the AICTE/ Osmania University/ State Government.

ug_courses.course_name: B.E - Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
B.E - Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
B.E - Computer Science and Engineering (Internet of Things and Cyber Security including Blockchain Technology)
B.E - Electronics Engineering (VLSI Design and Technology)

pg_courses.course_name: ME - Embedded Systems and VLSI Design (ECE)
M.Tech - Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
M.Tech - Information Technology (Artificial Intelligence and Robotics)

tuition_fee_details.note: This fee is subject to the final fixation of the annual fee for the block period 2022-2025 by the authorities of the State, Courts of Law, and TAFRC for B.E./B.Tech courses.

certificatesRequired: "Receipt of Certificates" from the convener TSEAMCET-22
S.S.C or its equivalent Marks memo
Intermediate or its equivalent Memo-Cum-Pass Certificate (Long Memo/Short Memo)
EWS Income Certificate issued by Tahsildar valid for the year 2022-23 (if applicable)
Caste Certificate issued by competent authority (if applicable)
Any other certificates (PHC, CAP, NCC, SG(Sports)) (if applicable)
guidelines: Students should bring all the original certificates for verification.

Submit the Original TC of Inter/equivalent, Original Income Certificate (if applicable), Original Caste Certificate (if applicable), and 2 sets of Xerox copies of the specified certificates (Sl.No 1 to 14) while reporting.
Pay the Miscellaneous Fee as specified.
Follow the Tuition Fee Notice as mentioned in the attached document.
Student must be accompanied by Parent/Guardian.
Only one person is allowed along with the student during reporting at the College.
Students must apply for the scholarship online before the deadline.
If they fail to apply on time, tuition fee reimbursement will not be granted, and they will be required to pay the fee themselves.

submissionProcess.step1: Complete online submission of the application.
submissionProcess.step2: Submit the hard copy of the application along with the required documents (Xerox copies) and income affidavit (original) at the Scholarship Section, Administrative Office.

documentsRequired: Original Income Affidavit (signed by the student and parent with date)
Passed/Promoted Marks Memo of Previous Year (1st and 2nd semester)
Bonafide Certificate (issued by the Exam Branch, CBIT)
Attendance Certificate (Certified by HOD for the year 2022-23)
If parents are in private/government employment, submit salary certificate from their employer
